summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PetCare Evidence Repository UI - all backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly
passed_tests: All 17 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Dashboard loads with key metrics and governance cards
Evidence Packs page lists available packs with verification status
Evidence Pack detail page shows file browser with SHA256 verification and search/filter
Governance page displays A-E sections with proper status badges
Security page shows RLS Status table with expected tables
Security page shows Bypass Roles table with service_role/postgres note
Audit Events page with working filters for event_type, severity, correlation_id
Explainability page with functional Rule Runs and Explainability Logs tabs
Report page renders markdown content with download functionality
Left sidebar navigation works for all 7 routes
All data integration between frontend and backend working properly
